environment.description:
Environment adds value from environment variable to each span.
It's required when the type is "Environment".

defaultValue.description: DefaultValue defines the default value to use if the environment variable is not set.

name.description: Name defines the name of the environment variable which to extract the value from.

literal.description:
Literal adds hard-coded value to each span.
It's required when the type is "Literal".

value.description: Value defines the hard-coded value to add to each span.

requestHeader.description:
RequestHeader adds value from request header to each span.
It's required when the type is "RequestHeader".

defaultValue.description: DefaultValue defines the default value to use if the request header is not set.

name.description: Name defines the name of the request header which to extract the value from.

type.description: Type defines the type of custom tag.
